sentences.english: After a bright flash, there came a very loudly thunder.
sentences.chinese: 一個閃電過後，緊跟的是咔嚓嚓的雷聲。

sentences.english: Suddenly, at the foot of Cha Cha a cracking voice again makes me feel dead leaves their rupture.
sentences.chinese: 驀然，腳下嚓嚓嚓的聲音又使我感到枯葉們的破裂。
